ction 8.1, Pregnancy and section 13, 
Nonclinical Toxicology 
– Moves human fertility study descriptions and infertility 
considerations from section 13, Nonclinical Toxicology 
– Animal fertility study descriptions remain in section 13, 
Nonclinical Toxicology 
FDA/CDER/OND/ODEIV/DPMH 38 
Example:   
8.3 Females and Males of Reproductive Potential 
Based on its mechanism of action, TRADENAME can cause fetal harm when 
administered to a pregnant woman [see Use in Specific Populations (8.1)].
